TopicTitle: (WIP)Alternative Engine's- Ram/Scram Jet (looking for a texture person!)

Articles.Content:
so what I had in mind was to make a simple scram-jet/turbo jet hybrid engine that would replace the stock turbojet and limit it to its real life maximum of mach 3.2,

I also have SEVERAL other ideas on the subject that you can vote on above.

ps I know there are mods that already nurf the stock turbo and add ram jets, ex: pizza and aero-space, and the new engine sim mod.

I was hoping for a less game breaking feel that was realistic but didn't need the use of two engines adding weight to the same craft just to reach scram-jet operation range and orbital velocity.

added info to poll definitions:

1: would have an isp of around 1,500 to 800 (200-400 at low/0 speed) and would need a separate engine to accelerate.

2: a scram jet with an aero-spike in it, great for take off and space flight, but heavy and needs to accelerate quickly to scram mode to save fuel, isp in scram mode (same as above) isp in spike mode (370-390vac)

3: basically a turbo with an after burner mode......think closer to stock turbo for this one.

4: A scram with an srb in it, great for take off or speed burst to orbit, but limited to one use, and you better hope that srb gets you to speed:D isp for SRB (250-300) (burn time maybe 30 sec's would get you up there.)
